name: Rocket n Roll - Deluxe Pack [Commodore 64]
description:
Rocket 'N Roll Deluxe is a complete package of the SEUCK creation made in 2019, as part of the SEUCK School SEUCK enhancement tutorial. (The online version is the latest version of the game enhanced with SEUCK Redux).

You and a friend have built two rockets. You then get tossed into space, ready for a trip of a life-time. You have always dreamt about going for a trip around the sun. Unfortunately however, your trip of a lifetime becomes a nightmare.

A solar storm pushes your rocket off course and your are about to enter alien territory. Luckily for you however your rockets are armed with a rapid pulse laser, which can wipe aliens out. Collect pink power pods for shields. If you collect one of those, you will be able to fly over the deadly background. 

There are 4 different alien zones in which you must fight. Watch out for the alien bosses at the end of each stage.

Can you reach the sun safely for a trip of a life time or will you become space garbage? Good luck.

Controls:

Joystick port 1 - Control blue rocket
Joystick port 2 - Control light red rocket

Credits:

Game design and graphics by Richard Bayliss (Using the Shoot Em Up Construction Kit by Sensisoft)
Additional Programming and enhancements: Richard Bayliss and Martin Piper (SEUCK Redux)
Music: Richard Bayliss
Tape loader: Martin Piper

(C)2019-2020 The New Dimension
